= Simple Prog - "Hello, World =
{{{
char txt [5] = {"Hello"};	

void Main(void)

{ int i;

    for ( i = 136; i > 8; --i )
    {
    //               X        Y      String
        Print_String(i, 150, "Hello, World!");

        Print_String(i, 170, txt);

        Delay(20);   // Delay 20 mS
    }

    Exit();         // Exit to OS

}
}}}
